name: Pizza Nachos Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: tortilla chips, marinara suce, mozzarella cheese, musghrooms, green pepper, red onion, sausage, pepperoni slices, pepperoni slices
recipeInstructionSteps: In a large pan or skillet, lay down half of the tortilla chips, followed by the marinara, mozzarella, mushrooms, green pepper, red onion, sausage, and diced pepperoni.
Bake for 15 minutes, until cheese is melted.
